+## `control_style`
+
+Indent style for control flow statements
+
+- **Default value**: `"Rfc"`
+- **Possible values**: `"Rfc"`, `"Legacy"`
+
+#### `"Rfc"`:
+
+```rust
+if lorem_ipsum &&
+    dolor_sit &&
+    amet_consectetur
+{
+    // ...
+}
+```
+
+#### `"Legacy"`:
+
+```rust
+if lorem_ipsum &&
+   dolor_sit &&
+   amet_consectetur {
+    // ...
+}
+```
+
+See also: [`control_brace_style`](#control_brace_style).
+
 ## `control_brace_style`
 
 Brace style for control flow constructs
